mapper.select: select 1 from user where id=#{userId} and trade_pwd=#{tradePwd}
select count(1) cnt from user_invite ui join user u on u.id=ui.invite_id left join sys_config lv on lv.code=u.level where ui.user_id=#{userId}

select ui.invite_id inviteId, ui.invite_name inviteName, ui.invite_time inviteTime, lv.code level from user_invite ui join user u on u.id=ui.invite_id left join sys_config lv on lv.code=u.level where ui.user_id=#{userId} order by ui.id desc limit #{start},#{length}
select u.id, u.trade_pwd, info.real_name, info.id_no from user u left join user_base_info info on info.user_id=u.id where u.id=#{userId}
